title: Jardim Do Cha
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Juice bar, Portuguese
description: Small, simple lunch restaurant in a quiet setting near the Cathedral of Evor. Offers several main courses plus soup and fresh juice, with a few vegan choices. Seating inside is limited; main seating area is outside in a garden. It is part of an association where various activities such as cooking classes, organic market, workshops, and courses are promoted.
